name: Raffles
overview: Inside Outing is an isometric arcade adventure game released by The Edge in 1988 for the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC and Commodore 64. It was later also released for the Atari ST and Amiga with the title Raffles. Subsequent 8-bit reissues were also given this title. It was released in the U.S. by Epyx as Devon Aire in the Hidden Diamond Caper.
